Package affix.java.project.moneyservice

Interface MoneyService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ExchangeSite
public interface MoneyService
This class is an interface for ExchangeSite in MoneyService

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean buyMoney​(Order orderData)
    This method is used for a buying order
    default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Double> getAvailableAmount​(java.lang.String currencyCode)
    This method exports the current amount at an implementing site for a specified currency
    default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Currency> getCurrencyMap()
    This method will export accepted currencies and their buy and sell rates for the current session as configured at start up
    void printSiteReport​(java.lang.String destination)
    This method is used to print a report presenting current currencies and their amount for an implementation of the MoneyService interface, i.e. a Site
    boolean sellMoney​(Order orderData)
    This method is used for a selling order
    void shutDownService​(java.lang.String destination)
    This method shuts down the service properly, i.e. closing any server/db connection.

  • Method Details

    • buyMoney

      boolean buyMoney​(Order orderData) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used for a buying order
      Parameters:
      orderData - holding value, currencyCode and transaction mode
      Returns:
      boolean holding outcome of operation
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required currency is not accepted

    • sellMoney

      boolean sellMoney​(Order orderData) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      This method is used for a selling order
      Parameters:
      orderData - holding value, currencyCode and transaction mode
      Returns:
      boolean holding outcome of operation
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if required currency is not accepted

    • printSiteReport

      void printSiteReport​(java.lang.String destination)
      This method is used to print a report presenting current currencies and their amount for an implementation of the MoneyService interface, i.e. a Site
      Parameters:
      destination - a String defining where to write the report, i.e. Console/Textfile

    • shutDownService

      void shutDownService​(java.lang.String destination)
      This method shuts down the service properly, i.e. closing any server/db connection. Storing data for all completed orders for future recovery etc
      Parameters:
      destination - a String defining file/db for data

    • getCurrencyMap

      default java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​Currency> getCurrencyMap()
      This method will export accepted currencies and their buy and sell rates for the current session as configured at start up
      Returns:
      Map holding supported currencies using currency code as key

    • getAvailableAmount

      default java.util.Optional<java.lang.Double> getAvailableAmount​(java.lang.String currencyCode)
      This method exports the current amount at an implementing site for a specified currency
      Parameters:
      currencyCode - String holding currency code used in local site
      Returns:
      Optional Double holding current amount for required currency at site i/a
